entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain early this evening and ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
